function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increase in mental health issues","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of reliable data on intimate partner violence during the pandemic","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and education about intimate partner violence during the pandemic","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of data for pandemic management","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for reliable and up-to-date data on covid-19 outbreak","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and education on disease prevention","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mental health, social isolation","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited social interactions and mental health impact","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"}]}
